title.narrative: Culture of Peace and Strengthening of the Plurinational Electoral Body
Fredskultur och stärkt kapacitet hos den Plurinationella valorganisationen

description.narrative:
Bidraget syftar till att stärka en mycket komplex politisk och social miljö, valmyndigheten i Bolivia, genom att ge institutionell förstärkning till högsta valdomstolen (Tribunal Supremo electoral "TSE") och decentraliserade Valdomstolar - Departmental Electoral Courts (Tribunal Electoral Departemental " TED ") i olika aspekter av valprocessen före valet 2020. Fyra förväntade resultat har definierats:
- Resultat 1: Att öka effektiviteten, kapaciteten och insynen i valstyrning och administration genom rådgivning.
- Resultat 2: Utarbeta och implementera en kommunikationsstrategi för att nå ut, skapa medvetenhet och främja insyn i hela valprocessen och minska potentiellt våld i valet.
- Resultat 3: Säkerställa utövandet av kvinnors rättigheter i valprocessen.
- Resultat 4: Återställa valutrustning och material för TED som har förstörs under konflikten i oktober-november 2019 för att kunna genomföra valet 2020.
I slutet av interventionen är det förväntade resultatet att stärka trovärdigheten av 2020-valprocess samt att stärka valorganets institutionella kapacitet.

The contribution aims to strengthen within a very complex political and social environment, the Plurinational Electoral Body in Bolivia as a whole by providing institutional strengthening to the Supreme Electoral Court (Tribunal Supremo Electoral "TSE") and the Departmental Electoral Courts (Tribunal Electoral Departamental "TED") on different aspects of the electoral process before elections in 2020.
Four expected outcomes have been defined:
- Outcome 1: To increase efficiency, capacity and transparency of electoral management and administration, through technical assistance and advice.
- Outcome 2: Design and implementation of a communication strategy to outreach, create awareness and promote transparency of the whole election process and mitiage potential electoral violence
- Outcome 3: To ensure in an effectively and efficiently way the exercise of women's rights in the electoral process.
- Outcome 4: Acquisition of election equipment and materials for the TEDs that have been burnt down during the conflict in October-November 2019.
At the end of the intervention, the expected result is to strengthen the credibility, plurality and inclusion of the 2020 electoral process as well as to strengthen the institutionality of the Electoral Body.

This contribution aims to strengthen within a very complex political and social environment, the Plurinational Electoral Body in Bolivia as a whole by providing institutional strengthening to the Supreme Electoral Court (Tribunal Supremo Electoral "TSE") and the Departmental Electoral Courts (Tribunal Electoral Departamental "TED") on different aspects of the electoral process before elections in 2020.
Four expected outcomes have been defined: - Outcome 1: To increase efficiency, capacity and transparency of electoral management and administration, through technical assistance and advice. - Outcome 2: Design and implementation of a communication strategy to outreach, create awareness and promote transparency of the whole election process and mitiage potential electoral violence - Outcome 3: To ensure in an effectively and efficiently the exercise of women's rights in the electoral process. - Outcome 4: Acquisition of election equipment and materials for the TED that have been burned during the conflict in October-November 2019.
At the end of the contribution the expected result is to strengthen the credibility, plurality and inclusion of the 2020 electoral process as well as to strengthen the institutionality of the Electoral Body.
To achieve the results, it will work through four established components: - The Technical Assistance component (component 1): To support/advice the TSE in strategic management and decision-making. At the technical level, it will support in the areas of civil registration and voter database management, electoral operation, results transmission and capacity building. - The Communication component (component 2): . The project will support the TSE in the implementation of a communication strategy involving strategic and relevant actors/stakeholders in the nine departments of Bolivia . As part of the outreach effort, it will also support the TSE in expanding the scope of communication through close coordination with the nine TED´s, political parties and CSO´s.
- The Gender Component (component 3): The project through will design and develop a strategy to be implementend to the TED to ensure the effective exercise of women's rights in the electoral process. - Procurement component (component 4): Considering that Four TED´s infrastructures, as well as the Civic Registration Service (Servicio de Registro Civico "SERECI"), have been seriously affected during violent attacks after the 2019 elections, a large number of office equipment has been lost, damaged or stolen. This componente will work in close coordination with the TED to replace the lost/burned equipment as well as the obsolete equipments.

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.
16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.
